price: Àwọn èrò inú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra, ní ọjọ́ yẹn, (ọgbà wọn) máa lóore jùlọ ní ibùgbé. Ó sì máa dára jùlọ ní ibùsinmi.
arabic: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: aṣḥābu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-aḥsanu maqīlan
